text:
Vinsight | Data Scientist | SF | https://www.vinsight.co/

Vinsight is looking to add a data scientist to our team. They will work with team of engineers, scientists and developers to review and update forecast modeling. They will look at new input features to feed into modeling to improve forecast to increase accuracy, precision and time before harvest.

Skills: Python, Machine Learning, R, Neural Networks, Geographic Information System (GIS), Deep Learning, Weather Forecasting, Random Forest, Numpy/Scipy/Pandas/Scikit-learn

Interested in chatting email: info@vinsight.co
